lexUnit.name: amazing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing great surprise, often due to seeming or virtual impossibility.

sentence.text: Only then did the amazing truth dawn .
` I still find it amazing that intelligent-looking people will come up and say they think Look Sharp ! is a good record .
Instead , he found an amazing resistance to forgetting .
I find that view absolutely amazing .
They are so basic they seem obvious , yet it 's amazing how often they are broken or ignored .
It seemed amazing that it was less than a year since that had been said .
During the next few days an amazing amount of evidence came to light .
It took an amazing amount of effort .
It was amazing how people did rally round at times like this .
It 's amazing what strength people do find .
When the film-makers were in America , going from penitentiary to penitentiary , looking in libraries , interviewing people , they stumbled on this amazing story about Marin .
They hear most usually from the share salesmen , the most amazing stories of quick and fantastic profits .
The award caps an amazing 10 year streak of success for Clayton , aged 31 .
Vice-captain Salim Malik , after gaining valuable experience in English conditions with Essex the previous season , had an amazing run of success .
` One of the most amazing things about my life is I have the most lovely dreams about all my old friends and the old days .
The amazing thing is that his measurements were so accurate .
The amazing thing about memory is that you can use the same hooks for a multitude of lists without ending up in confusion .
IT 'S amazing that judges can get away with outrageous statements .
It 's amazing that a small girl like that can have so much strength . "
It is amazing that you can still read calculations like my haemoglobin calculation , used as though they constituted arguments against Darwin 's theory .
Take a rest and try again -- it is amazing how much better you do the second time around .
It is amazing how resilient some yarns can be .
` It 's amazing what a help Olivia has been to me . "
What is so amazing is that this stuff keeps going on .
Amazing what influence can do .
Amazing what you can do with a few nails , is n't it ? "
If the NBC Symphony 's virtuosity is already breathtaking in the first and second movements , then the finale is still more amazing in its precision , weight and attack .
One of these schemes is an agro-industrial project , ambitious by any standards and quite amazing in a poor country ground down by war and economic blockade .
` It 's always amazing to me that you can be a man in charge of 100 or 200 people , then you get your pension book and suddenly you are regarded as deaf and daft .
She 's amazing for her age .
It 's been amazing for the very fact that everything is so different , every job is different .
Amazing spirit among the soldiers .
But it 's an amazing way of making a living .
Physically they are amazing , you can jump up and down on a cockroach , and they still get up and walk away .
